CUDA Kernels API Referenceïƒ

This module provides CUDA-accelerated functions for trajectory planning and dynamics computation with automatic CPU fallback.

Environment Variablesïƒ

MANIPULAPY_FASTMATH

Set to â€œ1â€ to enable fast math optimizations (~2x speedup with relaxed IEEE 754 compliance)

MANIPULAPY_USE_FP16

Set to â€œ1â€ to use 16-bit floating point precision for memory-bound kernels
